name: Guild Castle
typedesc: Blueprints are used to build certain buildings in the guild. When used it spawns building with the base level (1) that can be upgraded in the future
fulldesc: This will do something, yes

levels.desc: Hey look, level 1
Ooh, level 2
Ah, level 3
Do more with 4
Stay alive with number 5

name: Hero's Quarters
desc: This does not do anything, do not purchase this expecting it to do something
fulldesc: Provides no benefit currently. Will not be implemented until another future update

levels.desc: Does nothing
Also nothing
Literally nothing

name: Auction House
fulldesc: Grants lemons for commands related to auctions

levels.desc: Gives lemons when someone successfully bids on an auction
Auctions!!
Auctions!!!

name: Smithing Hub
fulldesc: Just gotta figure out what that something is

levels.desc: Gives lemons when people forge or liquefy 1 star cards
Gives lemons when people forge or liquefy 2 star cards
Gives lemons when people forge or liquefy 3 star cards

name: Gacha Bank
fulldesc: Yeah, it's a bank, a gacha bank. You know, the two things you want as far from each other as possible. Unless you fly in rockets to the atmosphere for fun

levels.desc: Gives lemons when a user does daily
Gives lemons when a user claims cards
Don't know if this level will exist later on
Gives lemons when someone completes an achievement in the guild
Gives lemons when someone completes a quest in the guild
Allows to purchase quest lines (Coming never)

name: Legendary Card Claim Ticket
typedesc: Claim tickets are used to claim cards of certain rarity or collection. They are usually awarded during events or for completing quests and collections
fulldesc: When used gives you legendary card. The collection is determined when awarded

name: Gift From Tohru
typedesc: Use Effect Card recipes to obtain usable or passive Effect Cards
fulldesc: When used gives you **Gift From Tohru** effect card. This is a passive item, so make sure you equip it into hero's effect card slot
